text: Microstigmata is a genus of spiders in the family Microstigmatidae. All species are from South Africa. ==Species== , the World Spider Catalog accepted the following species: *Microstigmata amatola Griswold, 1985 – South Africa *Microstigmata geophila (Hewitt, 1916) (type species) – South Africa *Microstigmata lawrencei Griswold, 1985 – South Africa *Microstigmata longipes (Lawrence, 1938) – South Africa *Microstigmata ukhahlamba Griswold, 1985 – South Africa *Microstigmata zuluensis (Lawrence, 1938) – South Africa ==References== Category:Mygalomorphae genera Category:Microstigmatidae Category:Spiders of South Africa
title: Microstigmata
